mapper.insert: insert into job_tasks( job_name, source_consume_adt, source_convert_adt, source_data_tables_id, source_data_tables_name, source_data_id, source_data_name, target_load_adt, target_data_tables_id, target_data_tables_name ) values ( #{jobName}, #{sourceConsumeAdt}, #{sourceConvertAdt}, #{sourceDataTablesId}, #{sourceDataTablesName}, #{sourceDataId}, #{sourceDataName}, #{targetLoadAdt}, #{targetDataTablesId}, #{targetDataTablesName} )
mapper.update: update job_tasks set job_name = #{jobTasks.jobName}, source_consume_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConsumeAdt}, source_convert_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConvertAdt}, source_data_tables_id = #{jobTasks.sourceDataTablesId}, source_data_tables_name = #{jobTasks.sourceDataTablesName}, source_data_id = #{jobTasks.sourceDataId}, source_data_name = #{jobTasks.sourceDataName}, target_load_adt = #{jobTasks.targetLoadAdt}, target_data_tables_id = #{jobTasks.targetDataTablesId}, target_data_tables_name = #{jobTasks.targetDataTablesName}, creater = #{jobTasks.creater}, create_time = #{jobTasks.createTime}, state = #{jobTasks.state}, iscancel = #{jobTasks.iscancel}, remark = #{jobTasks.remark}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, job_name AS jobName, source_consume_adt AS sourceConsumeAdt, source_convert_adt AS sourceConvertAdt, source_data_tables_id AS sourceDataTablesId, source_data_tables_name AS sourceDataTablesName, source_data_id AS sourceDataId, source_data_name AS sourceDataName, target_load_adt AS targetLoadAdt, target_data_tables_id AS targetDataTablesId, target_data_tables_name AS targetDataTablesName, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel from job_tasks where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into job_tasks
job_name,
source_consume_adt,
source_convert_adt,
source_data_tables_id,

source_data_name,

mapper.update:
update job_tasks
job_name = #{jobTasks.jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_consume_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConsumeAdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_convert_adt = #{jobTasks.sourceConvertAdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_data_tables_id = #{jobTasks.sourceDataTablesId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_data_tables_name = #{jobTasks.sourceDataTablesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source_data_id = #{jobTasks.sourceDataId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
source_data_name = #{jobTasks.sourceDataName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_load_adt = #{jobTasks.targetLoadAdt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
target_data_tables_id = #{jobTasks.targetDataTablesId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_data_tables_name = #{jobTasks.targetDataTablesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{jobTasks.creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{jobTasks.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{jobTasks.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
iscancel = #{jobTasks.iscancel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{jobTasks.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id}
